Question & Options:
["In the 2005 movie 'Alone in the Dark', how were Edward Carnby and his co-workers originally depicted in the script?"]
Options:
A. ["As superheroes fighting evil"]
B. ["As wealthy business executives"]
C. ["As real-life blue-collar folks who never expected to find hideous beings waiting for them in the dark."]
D. ["As paranormal investigators"]
Correct Answer: ["As real-life blue-collar folks who never expected to find hideous beings waiting for them in the dark."]

Question & Options:
["In the 2005 film 'Alone in the Dark', what was the premise of the original script based on?"]
Options:
A. ["A true story of a private investigator in the northeastern U.S. uncovering a disturbing paranormal secret"]
B. ["A fictional tale of a detective in the American Midwest solving a series of murders"]
C. ["A legendary fable of a ghost hunter in the southern U.S. discovering an ancient curse"]
D. ["An invented narrative of a police officer in the western U.S. facing a supernatural entity"]
Correct Answer: ["A true story of a private investigator in the northeastern U.S. uncovering a disturbing paranormal secret"]
